      public String getOutput​(int waitTime)
      This is generally called right after 'sendCommand' for getting the raw output from Stockfish
      Parameters:
      waitTime - Time in milliseconds for which the function waits before reading the output. Useful when a long running command is executed
      Returns:
      Raw output from Stockfish
